quizzes.texto: RESPONDA LAS PREGUNTAS 1 A 5 DE ACUERDO CON EL EJEMPLO
quizzes.descripcion: Lea las descripciones de la columna de la izquierda (1 - 5). ¿Cuál palabra de la columna de la derecha (A - G) concuerda con cada descripción? La opción H se usa para el ejemplo. Sobran dos palabras más. En las preguntas 1 - 5, marque la letra correcta A - G en su hoja de respuestas
quizzes.ejempregunta: You can sweep the floor with this object

preguntas.texto: Here you can wash the dishes
Here you can cook
You can light the stove with this
You keep the food cold here
With this device you can prepare milkshakes

quizzes.texto: RESPONDA LAS PREGUNTAS 1 A 6 DE ACUERDO CON EL SIGUIENTE TEXTO
quizzes.descripcion: Lea el texto y seleccione la palabra correcta para cada espacio.

preguntas.texto: The second country where most people eat pasta is
Pasta has become a favorite food because it
Sports people prefer pasta because it
Pasta became well-known in the United States because Italians
Who first brought pasta to Italy?
Both pizza and pasta
opciones: stay fresh for a long time
are prepared in only one way

quizzes.texto: RESPONDA LAS PREGUNTAS 1 A 6 DE ACUERDO CON EL SIGUIENTE TEXTO

quizzes.texto: RESPONDA LAS PREGUNTAS 1 A 6 DE ACUERDO CON EL SIGUIENTE TEXTO
quizzes.descripcion: Lea el texto y responda a las preguntas.

preguntas.texto: What is the author mainly doing with the text?
opciones: describing people who spend hours in front of the screen
suggesting that there are better leisure activities than TV
warning about consequences of watching the news all day
explaining why television is important to keep up-to-date

preguntas.texto: What might a person decide to do after reading this article?
opciones: try to talk less with the family

preguntas.texto: According to the text, information from TV
opciones: contains many things not worth learning.
is limited since it does not have diverse topics.

preguntas.texto: In the text, “5 years” refers to the time that
opciones: an average person watches TV in a lifetime.
you need to become an expert TV viewer.
someone takes to become addicted to TV.
TV needs to teach us something interesting.

preguntas.texto: Who first brought pasta to Italy?
Both pizza and pasta
opciones: stay fresh for a long time
are prepared in only one way
are prepared in only one way

quizzes.texto: RESPONDA LAS PREGUNTAS 1 A 6 DE ACUERDO CON EL EJEMPLO

preguntas.texto: I don’t think I’m going to pass this exam
Is there a bank near here?
I want to go to the movies
Do you mind if I open the window?
I spilled coffee on my shirt
Who's Luisa?
preguntas.correct: The one in the red dress
opciones: The one in the red dress
